title: Govt Must Continue To Promote Universal Transport Accessibility – Mbalula
text:
Transport Minister Fikile Mbalula has called on government to continue developing infrastructure that promotes universal access to public transport for disabled people.

Mbalula conducted an inspection on different modes of public transport in Pretoria on Friday, in an effort to improve accessibility.

He carried out the inspection alongside people with disabilities who often grappled with a number of obstacles when trying to move around the city through public transport.

He said that he hoped the challenges they faced would be a thing of the past.

“In everything we do, let us take the responsibility to infuse in our work the people with disabilities.”
